column2: "As long as you accept it, it's just the same as getting it! Hehe, is that too much praise?"
"Anyway, it might be even harder to find than a Digg, but taking it down should be about the same, in my totally unprofessional opinion."
"Sorry if I end up underestimating the difficulty of this one. Just finding it might be a lot more trouble than usual..."
"Don't let me down. And remember, I believe in you!"
